patthana23.15:4.1: Nakusalaṃ namaggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.15:5.1: Nakusalaṃ namaggahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.15:6.1: Nakusalaṃ namaggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
